radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: magnetic resonance imaging of the brain
radiographic_examinations.findings: Node-negative poorly differentiated stage IA non–small cell lung cancer.
Node-negative poorly differentiated stage IA non–small cell lung cancer.
Mildly dilated left atrium, normal regional left ventricular wall motion, left ventricular ejection fraction of more than 55%, trivial mitral regurgitation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Unchanged compared to the preoperative study.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Cove-type ST elevations and a right bundle branch block noted in precordial leads V1 and V2.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Normalized 48 hours after the Brugada pattern was noted.
